name: Baldur's Gate Name Generator
description: Roll up a legendary character name worthy of Faerûn! Whether you're a noble elf, a cunning tiefling, or a stalwart dwarf, find the perfect moniker to strike fear (or admiration!) into the hearts of your enemies... or allies.
introduction: Embark on your Baldur's Gate 3 adventure with a name that resonates with power, mystery, and a touch of the arcane. Our generator blends lore-friendly prefixes and suffixes to conjure names that feel right at home in the Forgotten Realms. Prepare to become a legend!
howToUse: Keep clicking until a name whispers to your soul (or at least sounds kinda cool).
If inspiration strikes, tweak the name to perfection. It's YOUR story, after all!
Share your awesome name with your friends and prepare for epic quests!

faqs.question: Are these names lore-accurate?
faqs.answer: We strive to create names that feel authentic to the Baldur's Gate universe, drawing inspiration from established naming conventions. While not *every* name will be a perfect match, most will fit right in.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for characters in other D&D campaigns?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While tailored for Baldur's Gate, these names are versatile enough to suit any fantasy setting. Let your imagination run wild!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! Click away, brave adventurer, until you find the perfect fit.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send us your suggestions, and we'll consider adding them to the generator in future updates.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's completely free! Enjoy generating names to your heart's content. We just ask that you spread the word and share the fun with your fellow gamers.

faqs.question: Why does my name sometimes sound a little… weird?
faqs.answer: Hey, sometimes the dice roll funny! The combinations are random, and occasionally, a less-than-perfect name pops up. Just hit 'Generate' again for a fresh start. Think of it as part of the adventure!
